steps.conclusion: None. The output follows all key rules: exactly one suggestion for a language exam, title is "TOEFL" (<=5 words, no joiners, no levels, no "course"), english_title matches, is_language_course=true, description in Portuguese, icon starts with "tabler-", output language Portuguese.
None. Title appropriateness is acceptable for a course suggestion per instructions; no missing required fields.
Could optionally pick a more thematically specific icon (e.g., tabler-certificate) or make the description slightly more specific to Portugal context; however, these are not required.
